tool_description: An API listing cooking food recipe from around the world
name: Cooking Recipe
title: Cooking Recipe

api_list.name: GetRecipeByCat
api_list.description: Return specific list of recipes by category which will be pass
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cooking-recipe2.p.rapidapi.com/getbycat/Indian Desserts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cooking-recipe2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://cooking-recipe2.p.rapidapi.com/getbycat/{category}"

print(response.json())
